name: Brake
goal: Brake is a road safety charity working with communities and organisations across the UK to stop the tragedy of road deaths and injuries, make streets and communities safer for everyone, and support people bereaved and seriously injured on roads. We also work in New Zealand and run global projects.
euInitiatives: Road safety; sustainable transport; air quality; cycling; walking. Specifically, we are currently looking to respond to EC consultation on General and Pedestrian Safety Regulations.
